Question: That year the ____s relocated to Tuckahoe, where they lived for the next seven years before returning to Shadwell in 1752.
Hints: He spent much time consulting maps and books and conferring with this person on numerous topics.
Until his death, this person invited students and faculty of the college to his home.
This person's youngest daughter Lucy died of whooping cough in 1785 in the United States, and he was bereft.
